original_text: Now when I had delivered the evidence of the purchase unto Baruch the son of Neriah, I prayed unto the Lord, saying,
korean_text: 내가 매매 증서를 네리야의 아들 바룩에게 넘겨 준 뒤에 여호와께 기도하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: Now when I had delivered the evidence of the purchase
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 매매 증서를 넘겨주었을 때

sentences.original_text: unto Baruch the son of Neriah
